an7.26:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you seven principles that prevent decline.
an7.26:1.2: Listen and apply your mind well …
an7.26:1.3: And what are the seven principles that prevent decline?
an7.26:1.4: As long as the mendicants develop the awakening factor of mindfulness …
an7.26:2.6: equanimity, they can expect growth, not decline.
an7.26:3.1: As long as these seven principles that prevent decline last among the mendicants, and as long as the mendicants are seen following them, they can expect growth, not decline.”
